linkInBio.title: What is Link-in-Bio and why do you need it?
linkInBio.subtitle: A link page is a mini-site that combines all your resources: social media, messengers, portfolio, products and services
linkInBio.p1: Link-in-Bio (multi-link page) is a page you place in your Instagram, TikTok, YouTube or Telegram profile description. Instead of one link, you get a full mini-landing with buttons, contacts, and even a product catalog.
linkInBio.p2: LinkMAX is a modern Linktree and Taplink alternative with AI content generation. Pick a niche (barber, photographer, trainer, psychologist) and AI creates a ready page in 2 minutes: with profile, needed blocks and copy.
linkInBio.p3: Unlike competitors, we don't take commission on your sales. All money from products and services is yours. Built-in analytics and CRM help understand which links work best.
linkInBio.keywords: Keywords: link page, link in bio, multi-link, linktree alternative, taplink analog, mini-landing

hero.benefit2: Leads land in mini-CRM and Telegram
hero.benefit3: Analytics show which blocks drive leads

problem.item2: People ask the same questions, you answer manually and lose time
problem.item3: A page becomes a menu of links, not a path to booking
problem.item4: No understanding: what actually gets clicked and where attention is lost
problem.solution: lnkmx creates one clear page where visitors quickly understand who you are, how you help, how much it costs, and where to click to book. And you see leads and analytics in one place.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions about lnkmx

q1.question: What is lnkmx and who is it for?
q1.answer: lnkmx is an AI builder for link in bio pages and mini-sites that helps you collect links, services, and lead forms in one place.

q2.question: How much does lnkmx cost?
q2.answer: The basic plan is free forever. Pro: 3 months - 4,350‚Ç∏/mo, 6 months - 3,698‚Ç∏/mo (-15%), 12 months - 3,045‚Ç∏/mo (-30%). Online payment and 14-day refund.

q3.question: How does AI page generation work?
q3.answer: Pick a niche and share a few details - AI builds the structure, copy, and CTAs in minutes. Free: 1 generation/month, Pro: 5/month.

q4.question: What blocks are available?
q4.answer: 20+ blocks: profile, links, buttons, images, video, carousels, products, price lists, forms, maps, messengers, reviews, FAQ, timers, and more.

q5.question: Do you have CRM and analytics?
q5.answer: Yes. Pro includes CRM for leads and Telegram notifications. Analytics show clicks, sources, and behavior.

q6.question: Is there a mobile editor?
q6.answer: Yes. You can edit your page directly from your phone.

q7.question: What integrations are supported?
q7.answer: Telegram for lead alerts and Google Calendar for scheduling. Socials and messengers are available as blocks.

q8.question: Do you take a commission on sales?
q8.answer: No. 0% commission on your sales - you only pay the subscription.

q9.question: How can I pay for Pro?
q9.answer: Pay by card and available payment methods. You can also use tokens (100 tokens = 1 day Pro).

q10.question: What is the refund policy?
q10.answer: Refunds are available within 14 days of payment according to local regulations. See the user agreement for details.

q11.question: Can I see real examples?
q11.answer: Yes. The gallery features real pages from creators, shops, and service providers.

q12.question: How is lnkmx different from Linktree or Taplink?
q12.answer: lnkmx includes AI page creation, CRM, and notifications without extra fees, plus flexible blocks and local languages.

q13.question: Is lnkmx suitable for shops or services?
q13.answer: Yes. Add a catalog, pricing, lead forms, and contact buttons to speed up booking or orders.

q14.question: Can I connect my own domain?
q14.answer: Yes, Pro includes custom domains and branding.

faq.title: Common questions
faq.subtitle: Can't find your answer? Reach out to support

q1.question: What is lnkmx?
q1.answer: lnkmx is a Micro-Business OS: an operating system for small business. It includes an AI page builder, built-in CRM for leads, Telegram notifications, and analytics. Everything you need to launch a business in one place.

q2.question: How much does it cost?
q2.answer: Basic plan is free forever. Pro is $5/mo when paid yearly. 14-day refund.

q3.question: How does AI work?
q3.answer: Pick your niche, write 2-3 sentences about yourself. AI picks the structure, writes copy, arranges blocks. Then edit.

q4.question: What blocks are there?
q4.answer: 25+: profile, links, products, pricing, form, booking, reviews, FAQ, map, messengers, video, gallery, and more.

q5.question: Is there a CRM?
q5.answer: Yes, on Pro. All leads in one place, statuses, notes. Plus Telegram notifications.

q6.question: Can I edit on phone?
q6.answer: Yes. Editor works the same on phone and desktop.

q7.question: Do you take sales commission?
q7.answer: No. 0%. You sell through your page - you keep it all.

q8.question: How is it better than Linktree?
q8.answer: AI builds your page. Built-in CRM. Telegram alerts. Local pricing. Interface in Russian.

q9.question: Good for stores?
q9.answer: Yes. Catalog, pricing, booking blocks. Visitors see products and prices, leave an inquiry.

q10.question: Can I use my own domain?
q10.answer: Yes, on Pro. Instead of lnkmx.my/name - yoursite.com.

q11.question: How to pay for Pro?
q11.answer: Visa, Mastercard, or local methods. Pricing in your currency.

q12.question: Refund policy?
q12.answer: 14 days from payment. Doesn't work for you - we refund, no questions.
